datas.title: Back-projective priming: Toward efficient 3d model-based object recognition via preemptive top-down constraints
datas.abstract: This paper describes a novel framework for context-based object-recognition/pose-estimation. High-level geometric constraints are used to optimize fitting of a 3d model to a 2d image through a process termed "back-projective priming". A practical problem in robotics, electrical outlet discovery, is used for testing. The robot, experimental setup, and ongoing/future work are described.
